## d. Synergistic activities

1. Trained numerous undergraduate research assistants on psychological methods, as well as high-school students from under-represented minorities through the Raising Interest in Science and Engineering (RISE) program at Stanford University.

2. Presented research at numerous international conferences including Cognitive Science Society, the International Conference for Computational Social Science, and the International Psychonomics Leading Edge Workshop.

3. Led numerous discussion and workshops on reproducible methods in psychological science, including a workshop on meta-analytic methods at the Annual Cognitive Science meeting in 2016.
